about.title: About me
about.text:
Meet me, a highly skilled software developer with a passion for creating innovative and efficient software solutions. With years of experience in the industry, I have honed my expertise in various programming languages and frameworks, including JavaScript, Python, and C#. Whether working as a freelancer or as an employee within a team, I bring a meticulous and detail-oriented approach to every project. My ability to understand complex requirements and translate them into functional, user-friendly applications has earned me a reputation for excellence and reliability. From developing web applications to designing scalable backend systems, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions that meet and exceed client expectations.

In addition to my technical prowess, I am known for my strong communication skills and collaborative spirit. I thrive in dynamic environments where I can work closely with clients and team members to ensure that all project goals are achieved on time and within budget. My proactive problem-solving abilities and commitment to continuous learning make me an invaluable asset to any project. Whether you need a freelance developer to tackle a specific challenge or a dedicated employee to enhance your development team, I am ready to contribute my expertise and drive to help you achieve your software development goals.

experience.title: Experience

Played a key role in developing new functionalities and enhancements for Rappi’s platform, focusing on UX/UI design integration and ensuring high availability and performance of web services.

Developed web and mobile applications from scratch using technologies such as .Net and Angular, closely collaborating with the backend team to integrate content management systems and enhance platform scalability.
Responsible for maintaining and developing critical functionalities for the database management system, using SQL to optimize operations and enhance data process security and efficiency.
